titles.title: Supporting the efforts of the United Nations to formulate a comprehensive convention on international terrorism and urging the President to continue work in cooperation with all interested members of the United Nations to formulate such a convention.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 2/7/2002--Introduced. Express support for the efforts of the United Nations (UN), and urges the President to continue to work with all interested UN members, to formulate a comprehensive convention on international terrorism.
